title: SBF’s trial begins, more layoffs, Israel at war with Hamas, Ripple secures another victory | Weekly Recap
description: This week, FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried's trial began; the crypto sector witnesses more layoffs; a Hamas-led attack stuns Israel; Ripple vs. U.S. SEC continues.

title: Litecoin’s Price Battle: Bulls vs. Bears in Critical Zone
description: Litecoin is said to have a neutral RSI as bulls and bears battle for market dominance.  According to Analysts, the asset can move to $70 once bulls seize control over the market, if not, the price could fall to $60.
